title: City Wall (Salamis: Ampelaki Bay)
description: A section of the ancient city wall of Salamis, dating to the fourth century BCE, has been excavated protruding from the north shore of Ampelaki Bay, where it was partly built into an early modern jettty.

properties.description: Location identified in Google Earth with reference to photos published in Chronique 2022 report.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Salamis City Wall
